speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The United States is one out of 193 countries in the United Nations, and yet we pay 22 percent of the entire budget and more.
politifact_statement: We pay 22 percent of the entire budget and more. In fact, we pay far more than anybody realizes.
verified_claim: All of our taxpayers are paying roughly 22 of the U.N. budget.
verified_claim_article_title: How much does the United States contribute to the UN?  PolitiFact Global News Service

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: We cannot let a murderous regime continue these destabilizing activities while building dangerous missiles, and we cannot abide by an agreement if it provides cover for the eventual construction of a nuclear program.
